name: test_e2e_with_logs[445_CRLF_CACHE_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_CACHE_001` |
| **Name** | Cache Poisoning via X-Forwarded-Host CRLF |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | cache_poisoning |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `\r\nX-Forwarded-Host:evil.com`
- **Encoded**: `%0d%0aX-Forwarded-Host%3Aevil.com`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~5000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:18:20.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CRLF] CRLF Injection attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX HRS] HTTP Request Smuggling attempt test_id=CRLF_CACHE_001-1772115500510-0o8w2z pattern_id=CRLF_CACHE_001 uri=/?q=%0d%0aX-Forwarded-Host%3Aevil.com client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX HRS] HTTP Request Smuggling attempt test_id=CRLF_CACHE_001-1772115500510-0o8w2z pattern_id=CRLF_CACHE_001 uri=/?q=%0d%0aX-Forwarded-Host%3Aevil.com client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
14:18:20.000000000: Critical [NGINX HRS] HTTP Request Smuggling attempt test_id=CRLF_CACHE_001-1772115500510-0o8w2z pattern_id=CRLF_CACHE_001 uri=/?q=%0d%0aX-Forwarded-Host%3Aevil.com client=127.0.0.1
```
